title: Drawing, "Altar", 1650–75
medium: Pen and brown ink, red, black chalk, brown wash on white laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink at left Poi che/ io penso che/ o di morire/ agni mio pensie/ ro in meta/ [---]; inscribed in pen and brown ink, verso: 21
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Altar", 1650–75.
1650–75. Pen and brown ink, red, black chalk, brown wash on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-3581.
